body_html: I asked the same questions on stackoverflow (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46652720/how-to-calculate-ctc-loss-of-a-sequence-with-all-blanks-using-tf-nn-ctc-loss), and get no answer after one month. My conclusion is that the current tf.nn.ctc_loss API cannot handle sequences with all blanks.
